summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley. The emails discuss a potential visit from Staley to Epstein, indicating a personal relationship. The emails also contain disclaimers regarding confidentiality and legal privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the emails, discussing a visit with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the emails, inquiring about visiting Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about a personal visit, indicating a friendly relationship.

keyFacts: The emails are dated January 5 and 6, 2011.
Epstein and Staley discuss a potential visit.
The emails contain multiple disclaimers about confidentiality and legal privilege.
There are indications of a personal relationship between Epstein and Staley.
